questions.question: What is the dominant color of the USB hub's casing?
What is the overall shape of the presented USB hub?
What material appears to constitute the external shell of the device?
How many USB ports are visibly present on the device's exterior?
What color are the indicators illuminating the USB ports?
Considering the device's connectivity, what kind of hub is it?

Are there any visible brand markings or logos on the device?
Does the product have any visible text other than branding?
What is the apparent texture of the outer surface of the device?
What is the connection type used by the device to interface with the computer?
